newsitem.title: TAIWAN: TAIWAN STOCKS - factors to watch - August 4.
newsitem.headline: TAIWAN STOCKS - factors to watch - August 4.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Taiwan stocks on Monday:
* Benchmark stock index expected to continue recent rally, led by trendsetting electronics.
* Allen Huang, fund manager, National Securities: "It will be important whether the other sectors can also rise to pick up the index, because they have not joined the recent rally."
* Commercial Times newspaper reports expected boom in July sales for microchip giant Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.
* Government to auction 440 million shares of state-run Chiao Tung Bank in afternoon.
* Brokers say profit-taking may emerge later in session if electronics remain lone gainer.
* Index rose 0.47 percent/47.34 points to close at 10,048.90 on Saturday.
